meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #5999.

td.p: Anjali Chelliah Sawe, a pediatric cardiologist from New York, New York
Theo McLauchlin, a graduate student from Montreal, Quebec
Sara Wilkinson, a country club concierge from Athens, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,000)

tr.td: THE GOSPELS
THAT '70s TEAM
"CO" CO.s
WOMEN'S FIRSTS
CORN-UCOPIA
ANIMATED PUZZLES
